content: COWEN: Underrated, and I think Trump has shown how powerful it is. Again, you don’t have to agree with his tweets, but it’s woken the world up that Twitter is not just some inferior Facebook that never was going to turn out to be anything. It’s extraordinarily powerful. People in Iran have known this for a long time. It will stay important and powerful. I think it’s still very, very underrated, actually. As a commercial venture, I couldn’t say, but it’s a force for shaping society.
